issue.title: [Docs] Change extension from format/README.md to format/README.rst
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
format/README.md is written with the _reST_ syntax.
